entry.title: Mad World
entry.summary:
Author: salvame

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,562Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 37

Summary: In a dystopian city divided by walls and wealth, Bruce Wayne owns a brutal underground fight ring. One night in the slums, he sees a boy, young, starving, fearless, stealing bread. That boy is Richard Grayson, caring for two other homeless children: Jason Todd and Tim Drake. Bruce offers protection, food, shelter, safety, but only if Dick fights for him in the arena. With a bat tattoo on his neck and black paint on his eyes, Nightwing is born. As his fame rises, the elites of the Clean City want to buy him, especially Clark Kent, a powerful collector of champions. When Dick is kidnapped, Bruce declares war. While Dick fights to stay free, Jason nearly dies in the ring, and Tim begins a new path as Bruce‚Äôs heir in the upper world. But in a city built on blood and lies, no one escapes untouched. (A new summary is in the works)

Bruce stared at the two halves of the last cowl he had had in storage on the Watchtower in disgruntlement. This would not be an issue if he were in the cave‚Äìwhere he had plenty of replacements.
